item.description:
Pack up your pooch, some doggie treats, dress in layers and let's meet at Tower Hill Dam Pond.  The loop hike is about 3 easy miles around the pond with lots of good smells and sniffs.

Don't forget your pooper bags !!

Parking is limited as the trailhead is off a dirt road.  Game plan is to meet at trailhead at 11 am and walk the loop.  Should take us about 2 to 2 1/2 hours give or take.....depending on how good the smells are !

There are a few places on the dirt road that look like trail heads.   As you drive along the dirt road,  you will start to go up a slight hill.  The trailehad we will be using is the 3rd spot along the road....there is a metal barrier across the trailhead.   Look for the Blue Subaru Outback.

 

 

Plunk is looking forward to a nice walk with her regular buddies as well as meeting some new ones.

If you have any questions, please email Judi and Plunk or give me a call (603-674-8672)

 

Woof woof

And don't to bring plenty of water for both you and your canine companions.
item.how_to_find_us: Plunk will be the cute beagle screaming "Over Here.....over here.......over here !!! "

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: Tower Hill Dam Pond - Auburn
